name: Lucro
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en: Lucro is an ecosystem token that powers a suite of leading utilities, including LunaSky - an NFT Marketplace, Crator - a crypto friendly social media platform, The Abstract - a 3d gaming & Metaverse platform and other utilities and partnerships under development.
